website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty boat cover that is expertly crafted and easy to store.
pros: Designed for long-term storage and highway travel
Integrated buckle and strap system for seamless fitting and trailering
Includes trailering straps and storage bag
cons: Intended for small utility and fishing boats only

website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy option for traveling or long-term storage, although it's limited to one size of boat.
pros: Made for smaller utility and fishing boats, 14 feet to 16 feet long (up to 75-inch beam)
Comes with a storage bag, support pole, and straps
cons: Some buyers report issues with the size (too small) and quality (color fades fast, rips)

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I spent the extra money for a "real" boat ...
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I spent the extra money for a "real" boat cover. This cover fit my Lund fishing boat like it was made for it. The strapping system is excellent and insures that the cover stays taut across the entire surface. My boat just endured 2 weeks of rain and drizzle including a day with more than 2" and was as dry and clean inside as the day I put the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Grampa D.

customer_reviews.title: I am exceptionally happy with this cover and would totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14ft alumacraft open boat. It is 65 inches wide and I have 4 pvc bows that stick up about a foot above the rails to support a cover. This cover fitted exactly with about 5-6 inches hanging over the side and enough in length to cover my 15 up motor. The material is quite heavy and has had about 6 inches of wet snow on top of it so far with no sagging. I am exceptionally happy with this cover and would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ron henry

customer_reviews.title: Great product good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The box states it comes with a support pole with slots for straps. Called customer support and they stated the only one with slots was for the outdoor table covers. I sent the documentation that stated the slotted support came with and they sent me a second support with the slots. Very good customer service and with the slots it works very well, I would buy this cover again in 10-15 years when it looks like this one may wear out. It seems to be a heavy cover and should hold up for years.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Hambly

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, I's go 4.5 stars if I could... Easy to strap down and the clips work just fine... I bought the 14-16 ft for my 14 foot aluminum fishing boat. There is enough room to pull it over the motor if I want. It holds water well, not perfectly. I wouldn't use it for outdoor over the winter freeze/thaw conditions... As far as overnight in a rainstorm and you get the water off the next day, it is perfect for that. Works great for keeping dust and leaves out as well. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great boat cover.
customer_reviews.text: I’m super impressed with this boat cover I thought it was going to be a thin easily torn cheap plastic cover but this is a great quality for the money! Fits my standard john boat nicely and so far 2 months it has held up nicely. It came with one “stand” not sure this is the right word but I had to do a little rigging for my particular boat with some wood to shape it so the water didn’t pool. Before I did the material was so water proof that it helps a bout 5 gals of water where it pooled for several days before I noticed. I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Grenier

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove. I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this boat cover and received it in 2 days. I put it on my WC14 Lund fishing boat and it fits like a glove. I really like the attached straps that hold it in place. You can tighten it down and really secure it. I have a couple PVC poles that go across the boat . They hold the cover up so the rain doesn't pool. The material is great and should last a long time. I recommend for those that have a need for a 14 or 16 ft V hull fishing boat cover.
customer_reviews.author: ELL

customer_reviews.title: 14-16'L x 75"L Fits my 14' deep V perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover. Appears better in quality than my old cover. It fits my 14' Lowe deep V perfectly even over the bow mount trolling motor. Would be a tight fit for a 16' boat with bow mount trolling motor. Had to modify one of the straps because too short, but only took me 5 minutes. I don't plan on ever using the center support since the boat resides in the garage. Cover will only be used on long road trips to secure all my fishing gear from prying eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this for the support pole.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this on my boat for a few weeks, so I can't comment on the cover. However, I will say that the support pole is completely worthless. It comes in sections that loosely fit together. It's made of cheap, slippery plastic. If someone isn't holding it when you tighten the straps it'll slide out from underneath the cover and either fall apart or sections will break. I've had two of the sections break. I ended up putting two five gallon buckets on the seats of my boat to support the cover so water will run off. Don't buy the cover for the support pole.
customer_reviews.author: St. Joe Blues

customer_reviews.title: The cover has been great and has held up in our brutal winter winds ...
customer_reviews.text: It's fit seemed a bit big - but that can be adjusted. The cover has been great and has held up in our brutal winter winds in SD. It is easy to use. The illustrations with the boat cover help to ensure the weather doesn't get in. The additional "stand" is placed on the center crossmember to help tent the material to allow for easier run off.
customer_reviews.author: CynD

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15' sailing skiff and this 16' cover fit very well - even lapped over the anchor roller and anchor. I constructed a pvc spine running the length of the boat, about one foot above the boat's shear so the water would not pool. The boat is not self bailing and yet stays dry.. If this was costing me 600, like some custom made covers, it would not be five stars - the rating is based on the fact that it is a good value and looks a lot better than a 40 dollar poly tarp.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid travel cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is pretty good. This is the second one I purchased. Only drawback is that it doesn't seem to be quite as waterproof as I thought it would be, so just shy of 5 stars for me....but if you pick up some Kiwi camp spray seems to do the trick and you won't have to worry about morning dew anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis P.

customer_reviews.title: It will cover the boat but isn’t great at keeping water out
customer_reviews.text: Does an okay job of protecting the boat. It won’t work as pictures unless your trailer is just like this one. The straps aren’t long enough. It also has a tendency to sag which then lets the water slowly drip in. I’ve been forced to get creative about finding ways to make a high point in the boat to shed the water off. It came with a flimsy plastic rod to do that, but it’s always knocked over in any wind and is not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Protect your beloved boat
customer_reviews.text: So far, this cover has held up to every storm Florida has thrown at it! The layout of my boat does allow for some water to pool, but NO water has made it through to the boat itself. The straps make it easy to tie down around the trailer and keep everything in place well. This is a great buy and a great way to protect your boat!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B.

customer_reviews.title: Cover
customer_reviews.text: Durable cover, previous cover lasted 6 years until mice got to it. This is the second purchase of this cover. For my boat it could use a few more straps. Boat is stored outside. Made a spine on the inside of cover from bow to stern to support cover. Fast delivery, would (did) buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Well made cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very waterproof and the material seems durable. The straps work well and attach to the trailer with plenty of extra strap material. If you have a 14 foot boat there is at least a foot of extra cover at the rear. The center stand works great but cutting the post was required for an exact fit. Two posts would have been better for water run off
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best boat cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best boat cover for the money. This fits my 14' with enough to cover the motor and have plenty to pull down on the sides. The support pole is useful but not the strongest. I use the support pole and a 5 gallon bucket up front to effectively disperse the strongest rains. No more bailing and collecting leaves from the bottom of my sitting boat.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Ruohomaki

customer_reviews.title: Show for
customer_reviews.text: Cover faded in a day or two. Water leaks through it pretty good. But, the material seams to be strong, It does keep the leaves out. but I'm not sure about the durability over time. This is not what I was expecting for the price.
customer_reviews.author: spike

customer_reviews.title: Tough Boatcover
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this boat cover. I bought the first one almost Ten years ago. I must say I shamefully abused It by exposing the boat cover to horrendous neglect and atrocious conditions and it continued to serve its purpose. Finally after many years a tree limb pierced it beyond repair. It was a a damm good boat cover.
customer_reviews.author: james flannery

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Good strong material, good fastening system, fit great, I like the extra stand to hold up the cover, was able to pull it over the seats and fit over the Bimini top in its down position. Hope it lasts in the sun, for the price I'm very happy with my purchase! Yes I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: john a medina

customer_reviews.title: Poor longterm durability.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted right at two years before the sun and weather broke down the material to where it's falling apart. I would have expected it to last longer given it cost more and was advertised as "heavy duty". At first it was nice and fit well. I'm sure many of the positive reviews are for new items and not regarding it's durability over time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: faded in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: This cover looked great right out of the box. However, in just 2 days it faded completely. I seriously doubt it will last even 1 year. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette B

customer_reviews.title: So far it seems to be very sturdy yet light weight
customer_reviews.text: I have a '93 Tracker Pro Deep V 16 and is 16' X 75". The first one I bought said it fit 16 to 18 by 79, NOT even close length or width. This one fit PERFECTLY. Even long enough to cover the motor. When it comes time to replace (after I see how long it'll actually last), I'll probably go with this one again. So far it seems to be very sturdy yet light weight. I'll do an update as time goes on, I've only had it on about a month so far.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat Cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover fit my 14 foot restored Sea Nymph like a glove. The only drawback that I can see is that it needs more strap tie downs. Other than the strap discrepancy, the cover is well made and covers well as advertised. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Elson

customer_reviews.title: Turns pink
customer_reviews.text: Starts turning pink if left in the sun... After a few months you now have a pink boat cover instead of gray.
customer_reviews.author: Bowhunter

customer_reviews.title: seems well built and looks good
customer_reviews.text: This was just installed and I bought the 14-16 size for my 14 foot boat and it covers the motor as well. A single person can put the cover on with ease and all the straps are sewn on very well. Post is a plastic piece of engineering with limited adjustment but works for the most part. Can't comment on durability or water resistance yet.
customer_reviews.author: wandy4

customer_reviews.title: Good rhick material
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Good material. Maybe it needs an expensive boat nore substantial than my 14 ft. Aluminum basic. Cannot keep it taut. Rain collects in pools. Too big??
customer_reviews.author: Holly C.

customer_reviews.title: He is more than happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He is more than happy with it. He has a 14 foot Valco and has bought several boat covers. None last more than one Oregon winter. This one fits better than any of them. It is good quality and great fit and will last much longer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is an updates review. Initial cover that I received broke within a couple of days of trailering. I requested an exchange through Amazon. I received my new cover within a few days. The product is "meh" but the customer service is great. If you go easy on the cover it should last. If it doesn't, at least you know this company will make it right.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the budget-minded
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to find that it actually fit my Livingston 14 footer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straps are not made to last
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover for 4 months. For the most part it has been just sitting on my boat not strapped tight not moving. And recently one of the straps ripped cleanly leaving me with having to find a way to bungee the cover over my boat. Not a great sign that the straps didn't even make it through one season.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 foot Gregor aluminum boat and this boat cover fits absolutely perfect I highly recommend this cover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this for a trip i was taking, ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a trip i was taking, ordered way ahead of trip. Boat was being worked on, didn't try cover on until a few days before trip. To small does not fit my tracker 16, which is only 15 and a half feet. Now it is to late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Rodriquez

customer_reviews.title: Well made cover - just insure proper fit as soon as it arrives
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Only problem was i ordered it early so by the time i tried to put it on and it didn't fit i was to late to return it for exchange. So now i have a well built unused boat cover in its box in my attic.
customer_reviews.author: ENC-Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Got the A: 14-16'L Beam Width to 75" cover for my 2019 Lund Fury SS. Fits perfect. I have 2 seats, console no windshield and no trolling motor. Cover fits with seats up and provided pole in the bow. Hangs over the sides about 2". Great price and value. Have owned several of these covers in the past. I keep them treated with a marine water repellent and get about 5 years out of them. I dont recommend them while towing.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdinand

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly and I was initially very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to cover a 16' aluminum boat while I drove it from North Dakota to California. It fit perfectly and I was initially very happy with it, but one of the plastic buckles broke before the boat ever moved. Just the wind in North Dakota was strong enough to break the plastic buckle. I ended up having to tie the nylon strap to the trailer frame to make the trip, but had to stop every couple of hours to re-tie it and tighten it up. What a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-Duty Boat Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good, well constructed boat cover. It fits well on my 14' Starcraft. Nothing not to like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Butler

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight material.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for a 14 foot. Good heavyweight fabric. Great value for the price. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's elderly family member. The boat needed protection from the weather after being relocated. It came with easy directions and a support pole. It fits perfectly and was very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good cover for the money. I initially thought it would be too small when I took it out of the box but it fit quite well. I will need to get one more center pole. It comes with one , but I still have water pooling on top. I bought a 14-16ft size. I have a 16 ft Lund with 3 pedestal seats, bow mount trolling motor and tiller gas motor.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and straps are good  Cover is heavy and looks like it should last.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover fit Mt 14.5 ft Lowe vbottom just right
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: This product states 14-16' coverage, however, my jon boat which is 16' exactly is short material about 2 ft. My width is just over 5ft and there is barely enough material to stretch it from corner to corner and cover 14 ft up to the front platform...and this is without any kind of tent pole or chairs adding obstruction. Material itself seems ok but the dimensions are short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't so bad that I felt like going through the hassle of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but mine had a sewing error. The fabric was folded over at a seam. Wasn't so bad that I felt like going through the hassle of sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Gee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This cover is exactly the right one for a 14' Sylvan Super Snapper. It covers the boat and Mercury 9.9 perfectly, looks good and is well made. i have not towed with it on yet but have no doubt it will perform well. VERY HAPPY with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Flintlock

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable.
customer_reviews.text: Living in Michigan, this cover has been put to the test, and has exceeded all expectations! This is the strongest, most durable and affordable cover I have purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my 14' lund, and keeps the water. Good quality also!
customer_reviews.author: C. Price

customer_reviews.title: Too short for 16ft boats.
customer_reviews.text: I have an Alumacraft v16; 16' with 70" beam. The cover is too short by about 4". It is advertised as fitting 14-16' boats with 75" beam but does not.
customer_reviews.author: tqroljoe

customer_reviews.title: fit my 15 ft weldbilt boat perfect - don't waste your time on a walmart cover ...
customer_reviews.text: fit my 15 ft weldbilt boat perfect - don't waste your time on a walmart cover - this cover is well made, fits and is made out of high quality material - best cover for the money 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not wide enough in the front half. Returned it for a refund and got a larger model.
customer_reviews.author: St0mp

customer_reviews.title: Very strong cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and not hard to put on my 13.5 ft boat
customer_reviews.author: Marie Swaney

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job... but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the cover does it’s job and fits nicely, sadly the color faded within 2 weeks and has become and eye sore despite it only being a couple months old! 5 stars for functionality and 2 at best for quality of the boat cover material for fading so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is really good. It is as good a cover as those costing three times as much. I like that it comes with a center pole to keep rain from puddling on the cover. I have a 16 foot boat with a 73" beam and this fits well, although I can't fit it over my outboard - that's okay because I have a separate cover for that.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Steve Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Quality #1, Fit #2
customer_reviews.text: Love the cover, measured my beam, and did not fit with my console windshield installed, with it off, it fits ok. great material, sturdy straps which I have had problems with the last two I owned. Overall quality is great, just be careful if you order one to make sure that the Beam is a little larger than your boat actually is.
customer_reviews.author: floyd henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great cover. Long enough to cover my 14' aluminum ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Long enough to cover my 14' aluminum runabout and also cover my new Honda outboard.
customer_reviews.author: Robert John Mathiasen

customer_reviews.title: Not The Same
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar cover that I purchased from FleetFarm that lasted 2 years. The one I bought from Amazon lasted two weeks before straps started shredding. This cover is garbage. Avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Perschon

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: We've had this cover for 3 months and the stitching on the top is fraying already
customer_reviews.author: DianeStandish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: has held up well for a year. Might make it two years. Phoenix AZ
customer_reviews.author: QWERTY

customer_reviews.title: Would not order again
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 people to stretch it tight and snap it together In the middle. Support was no help fixing the issues . 2nd cover from them.
customer_reviews.author: M. V.

customer_reviews.title: fits over my 13 foot lancer Cox fishing boat nicely i ordered the 14ft-16ft size so it can over ...
customer_reviews.text: material is tough, fits over my 13 foot lancer Cox fishing boat nicely i ordered the 14ft-16ft size so it can over lap the motor and the ole holders it works great i can trailer the boat without having to remove the items out of the boat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Woods423

customer_reviews.title: not good for me but good for him
customer_reviews.text: actually didnt fit my boat so gave to Grandson and fit his perfectly. He was happy. A very nice cover and good workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: rockergal

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: very poor fit was very wide and very short sent it back
customer_reviews.author: ron prince

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cover fits my 14ft Klamath very well. Very well priced
customer_reviews.author: Jerr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! Fits our 16 foot fishing boat perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 14' boat perfectly and even had enough extra to cover the motor. The fabric seems sturdy and well stiched. The straps also fit my trailer. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Hills

customer_reviews.title: my boat is not shaped like the one in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Works almost. my boat is not shaped like the one in the picture, more square. But I made due.
customer_reviews.author: Fineseller

customer_reviews.title: to short
customer_reviews.text: my boat is 16 feet,and this cover is 2 feet short.
customer_reviews.author: richard giles

customer_reviews.title: Product fails for waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Water does leak in had to put a tarp over the cover to keep it out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 16' Lund great! my boat is 16' x 4' and it fits great even with my steering station that sits 12" above the sides of the boat. material sheds water great and feels pretty tough. I will update after a SE Alaska winter as how it does.
customer_reviews.author: darwin

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a couple weeks, so this is my first impression. I'll update down the road. The material is lighter weight than canvas by far, more like the weight of a backpack. Definitely a heavier material than some of their lower budget models, and the strap system is much nicer than on their lower budget models. Oh, and it keeps the rain and leaves out of my boat quite well!
customer_reviews.author: BCo

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for weather
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great for a couple months, ripped during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mulnix

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great haven't been on the road yet to try it
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Its really hard to get the cap off by hand. It needs built in handles on the cap and feeder body. I have to use two very large channel lock pliers to open it even when its only mildly hand tightened when put together. Other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: the canvas fit nicely, how are the straps were too short for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very durable material, the canvas fit nicely, how are the straps were too short for the type of trailer I have but I was able to add extension straps to the existing straps. Definitely a good buy either way
customer_reviews.author: blair ivall

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT FIT PERFECT AND I WILL GET ANOTHER ONE FOR MY BIGGER BOAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: steve walker

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Faired the Michigan winter well. Very happy with this. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty boat cover
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son- fits his 14Ft. boat perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: sharptail

customer_reviews.title: Top quality; top fit
customer_reviews.text: By far the best boat cover I have ever purchased. Fits my 1934 15' Lyman like a glove, and the fabric promises long life..
customer_reviews.author: Gene Porter

customer_reviews.title: Cover doesn't work as described
customer_reviews.text: Does not perform as described.Cover doesn't have enough strength to not hold water.collapsed despite sectional pole in the middle and the downs. Worthless
customer_reviews.author: Roger G.

customer_reviews.title: It fit well, and will hold going down the ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit well, and will hold going down the highway. If you have a front mount trolling motor however, it may require a couple extra straps to hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This cover is not waterproof, doesn’t even keep our morning dew. Don’t buy, it’s ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and I have seen other covers twice their price. This is a great cover at any price!
customer_reviews.author: Jensen Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Cover fit perfect. The extra pole helped as well
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 foot 3 inch alumacraft fishing boat. Cover fit perfect. The extra pole helped as well. So far very pleased with the cover for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal out there I have found
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 15' aluminum boat. Fit is not %100, but it keeps the rain and leaves out. Best deal out there I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Fit
customer_reviews.text: My boat is 16' and it did not fit , was too small
customer_reviews.author: Landa

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits great keeps my boat dry and a great value
customer_reviews.author: Tom Temple

customer_reviews.title: good quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Second one I purchased, good quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Boat Cover
customer_reviews.text: This boat cover arrived as promised and fit my 14' Lund perfectly. The stretch binding around the cover makes the fit easy to adjust, and the many adjustable straps complete the job. I use two inflatable exercise balls placed on the seats to complement the adjustable support that comes with the cover. This keeps the Cape Cod rain and snow from filling my boat. I am very pleased with this boat cover.
customer_reviews.author: James Boutilier

customer_reviews.title: great boat cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good cover. Has lasted well through the winter and very strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Rating for sizing
customer_reviews.text: Beware the cover that is supposed to fit 16 ft did not come close on my 15'-9" Jon boat. Go up a size. Other than that, quality seems to be good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected. Fit my 16 foot Lowe perfectly. Excellent quality. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Chipper

customer_reviews.title: Great value so far.
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been in the boat for a few days. I think it’s great value for initial quality out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the sun and leaves out.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and durable. It will hold water occasionally but I wall by it frequently and pull the fabric to drain the occasional puddle off the cover. I don't trailer it with the cover on but believe it would stay on given the number of straps.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Nice........
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and looks marviloius...It hailed an hour after installation and I was suprised it held up so great. I am the envy of block.
customer_reviews.author: grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boat cover
customer_reviews.text: This boat cover is of great quality and fits very nicely.It was gift for my husband and was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item...it sure beats tying down a tarp on the boat!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: bass tracker
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and looks good on my 16 ft bass tracker.
customer_reviews.author: Shanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fit great and did just what I wanted, and the support in the middle keeps the water off
customer_reviews.author: Dan Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Would buy same one again
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove. Mid weight material was suitable for the job. Great color.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Kerchner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, however
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, however, I had to order WAY bigger than my boat. Had to return 3x to get a size that fit. Followed all measurements, length and beam.
customer_reviews.author: David Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Nice, except for one thing...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a new 2012 16' Crestliner Kodiak. Fits really well, except for where it goes over the side console. I have to remove the windshield in order for it to fit down over the starboard side. Not a major issue, but I'd like to leave my windshield intact instead of taking it off and on. Other than that, good quality and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: SeBo

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat Cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems to be well made and was easy to put on the boat. I was very pleased when I purchased one that was too small and had to return it. The process was quick and easy and my reorder shipped right away, as did the original order. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Goury

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories StormPro Heavy Duty Boat Cover with Support Pole
product_meta.description: The Classic Accessories StormProTM is the Heavy-duty boat cover designed for both long-term storage and highway travel. The high strength StormProTM Marine Canvas has been engineered for extra durability and all-weather protection that is extremely strong and protects your boat from UV damage, dirt, and any type of weather that might damage your investment. The full cut given to the cover allows extra room for accessories such as bow rails, running lights, etc... The elastic cord sewn into the bottom hem, and the dual rear air vents designed to reduce moisture and ballooning, give the cover a tight, custom fit. An integrated buckle and strap system provides easy fitting while trailering your boat, and adjustable straps snap into quick-release buckles on the cover. Our advanced fabric coating technology and heavy-duty fabric give you the maximum in water resistance and repellency. The included support pole provides additional structure to the cover, preventing water from pooling and helps to preserve the life of the cover. A heavy-duty storage bag and trailering straps are also included with the cover.
feature_bullets: We don’t just cover vehicles and equipment – we support your lifestyle.
Time outdoors is important, and we want to help you make the most of it.
We share your passion for adventures, that’s why we carefully consider all the tiny details that make our products useful, convenient, and practical
